title: So glad...
content: ... removed most of my posts from this forum.

comments.content:
...all things run their course.

What did Kenny Rodgers say about knowing when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em?

I looked around and was suddenly overcome with a unfounded sense of joy.

And just when I feel that way James I find something more to work on - to play with - to lead me further astray - to keep me in the game. Remember Art is not a choice - it is a gene defect we are born with.

I'm not referring to art or work.

Only Typophile
OK - since it is only Typophile, no big deal.......

Thanks Russell,

One of my favorites!
Live version better than the studio;)
So you deleted most of your old posts, and wrote a new one just to celebrate... What a wonderful world we live in!
